tool_description: The Crowdtilt API allows developers to quickly and easily integrate crowdfunding or group payments into their applications.
name: Crowdtilt
title: Crowdtilt

api_list.name: List User Payments
Get Campaign
Get rejected payments
Get User Bank
List Campaign Settlements
List Users
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crowdtilt-crowdtilt.p.rapidapi.com/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crowdtilt-crowdtilt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

List User Cards

Get campaign payment
Get User's Default Bank
api_list.description: To get the current default bank for a user, you can simply request:

api_list.name: Get User Campaigns
api_list.description: This resource returns all the campaigns that the user has created as well as the campaigns that he paid for.

api_list.name: Authenticate User
api_list.description: To authenticate a user, you can pass in the user's login credentials, email and password, as query parameters.

api_list.name: List User Banks
api_list.description: This resource lists the bank accounts associated with this user.

api_list.name: Get Campaign Settlement
api_list.description: Campaign Settlements represent a disbursement of funds for a tilted campaign. A campaign settlement will show you the campaign, bank, and user that the settlement belongs to. It will also show you the admin_amount, which is the amount of money being sent to the admin's bank account. The escrow_amount is how much money from the campaign is going into your escrow account (it represents fees charged to the admin and payers).

api_list.name: List User Paid Campaigns
api_list.description: This resource returns all the campaigns that the user paid for.

api_list.name: Get User Campaign
api_list.description: This resource returns a specific campaign created by this user.
